slide1.title: DO YOU NEED HEAVY MACHINERY?
slide1.subtitle: WE HAVE THE SOLUTION
slide1.desc: We support the development of developing countries; we play an active role in the construction of critical infrastructure projects such as schools, hospitals, and roads, contributing to the increase of social welfare.

slide2.title: PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT
slide2.subtitle: BUILT FOR PERFORMANCE
slide2.desc: Our inventory features the latest models from top manufacturers, ensuring reliability and efficiency for your projects.

slide3.title: GLOBAL SHIPPING AVAILABLE
slide3.subtitle: WE DELIVER WORLDWIDE
slide3.desc: From our yard to your site, we handle all logistics to ensure your equipment arrives safely and on time.

Services.reasonsHeading: Industry Leader in Construction Equipment Supply

quality.title: Quality Equipment
quality.desc: Offering guarantees an agreed price for all covered repairs, allowing you to budget carefully and avoid unexpected expense.

fast.title: Fast Service
fast.desc: Providing a unique insight into the health of your machine, helping to avoid expensive repairs and unexpected downtime.

support.title: Support 24/7
support.desc: Regular, planned Care Inspection gives you the knowledge you need to ensure that your machine is always in top shape on the world.

BEST QUALITY EQUIPMENT
About.desc: We provide high-quality heavy machinery to clients worldwide, ensuring reliability and efficiency for all your construction needs.

sub1.title: High Quality Equipment
sub1.desc: Our inventory consists of top-tier machinery from leading manufacturers, guaranteed to perform under the toughest conditions.

sub2.title: Good Service Quality
sub2.desc: Our dedicated team offers exceptional support and service, ensuring your operations run smoothly without interruption.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.heading: WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY
Testimonials.desc: We strive for a complete life-cycle approach in all we do to improve the use of the planet's resources. Together with our suppliers and other partners, we are accelerating a step change toward circularity.
Testimonials.author: Adam Hoffman

AboutPage.title: About Azza Machinery
AboutPage.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Heavy Machinery Trading
AboutPage.desc: Azza Machinery is a premier global trading company specializing in heavy construction equipment. With years of experience and a vast network of suppliers, we provide high-quality machinery to clients worldwide. Our mission is to deliver reliable, efficient, and cost-effective solutions for all your construction needs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To empower construction projects globally by providing top-tier machinery and exceptional service.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be the world's most trusted partner in the heavy machinery trading industry.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: Get in Touch
ContactPage.desc: Have questions about our inventory or need a quote? Reach out to us today.
